title: Mickey's orphans
brief_description: Mickey, Minnie and Pluto are preparing for Christmas when a stranger drops a litter of mischievous kittens on the doorstep. Always the naive generous type, Mickey takes them in and they predictably run rampant, a path of misery and destruction cut through the very soul of middle America while making its children laugh!
